column1: # 1. Use this template to add subjects and marks for existing students
# 2. First import student data using the result_template.csv
# 3. Ensure Roll Number and Class Code match existing student records
# 4. Each row represents one subject for one student
# - roll_no: 6-digit student identification number (must match existing record)
# - class_code: Class identifier (must match existing record)
# - marks: Numerical marks obtained in the subject
